text: Michael Flynn says he can “breathe freedom and liberty” for the first time in 4 years in a statement released Thursday, a day after President Trump granted him a full pardon. https://t.co/5B4QQH8zVq

name: NBCNews
text:
Many Air Force nurses are spending Thanksgiving fighting the war against Covid-19.

"As members of the Department of Defense, we’re tasked to fight all enemies, and that's whoever and wherever they may be -- including this virus," says Capt. Golemboski. https://t.co/sXKsh0bp5T

name: NBCNews
text:
As South Dakota takes a hands-off approach to the coronavirus pandemic, Native Americans feel vulnerable.

"It's like we're trapped in a house on fire and we're doing our best to put it out," a member of the Cheyenne River Sioux Tribe says. https://t.co/qa3Kodjvin

name: NBCNews
text: In a heartfelt pre-recorded Thanksgiving message, the late Alex Trebek reminded fans to hold out hope despite the pandemic, imploring viewers to "keep the faith." https://t.co/a1Sw9cei2M

name: NBCNews
text: WATCH: President-elect Biden talks to @LesterHoltNBC about his priorities for his first 100 days in office, whether he supports investigations into President Trump, and how his admin. would approach racial injustice. https://t.co/oj3NlFQGbh - @NBCNightlyNews

name: NBCNews
text: Coronavirus outbreaks in nursing homes hit a record high as more than 1,300 facilities across the US reported having 3 or more confirmed cases during the first week of Nov., according to an NBC News analysis of federal data. https://t.co/hgyjuxBIOi

name: NBCNews
text: Rolling out a Covid-19 vaccine to even a fraction of the world's 7.8 billion people will require conquering an epic supply-chain challenge at a scale that dwarfs any other in history. https://t.co/T6Ig6rH7jH

name: NBCNews
text:
Early in the pandemic, hospitals were competing for ventilators, Covid-19 tests and personal protective equipment.

Now, sites across the US are competing for nurses. https://t.co/QdWTHRcNKH
